briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study of VX-121 Combination Therapy in Participants With Cystic Fibrosis (CF) Heterozygous for F508del and a Minimal Function Mutation (F/MF)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of VX-121 Combination Therapy in Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis (CF) Who Are Heterozygous for F508del and a Minimal Function Mutation (F/MF)
summary: The purpose of this study evaluates the efficacy and safety of VX-121/tezacaftor/deutivacaftor (VX-121/TEZ/D-IVA) in CF participants who were heterozygous for F508del and a minimal function mutation (F/MF participants).

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Percent Predicted Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (ppFEV1)

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
